313045.井戸の中から 声が聞こえる……。: You hear a voice from inside the well...

313048.「ええっ！？\n この中に 誰かが 閉じ込められてる！？\n すぐに 助けなくち:
W-what?! Someone's trapped inside the well?!
We have to hurry and get them out!

313053.「でも……向こうも においで\n オイラの正体に 気づいたみたいで\n ここに:
But... seems he knew who I was from my smell
too, and locked me in here.

313070.「同族だから 殺さないでやったが\n おかげで 極上のエサに ありつけるッ……！:
Since you're a wolf too, I didn't kill you!
But... I have to thank you for allowing me to
find this delicious morsel!

313074.「<pc> お願いだ……。\n コリスを 助けて……！:
Please, <pc>...
You have to save Coris...!

313076.日が沈み あたりが 暗くなってきたようだ……。: As the sun sets, it begins to get darker...

313079.コリスと <pc>は\n井戸のフタを こじ開けた！:
Coris and <pc> both pried
open the lid of the well!

313082.「オイラ においで わかったんだ。赤い髪の\n モントーって人……人間の フリし:
The smell gave it away. That guy with the red
hair, Monto... he's really a wolf pretending
to be a human.

313083.「おーい！ みんな！\n 井戸の前に 人間の姿をした\n オオカミがいるぞー！:
Heeey, everyone! That guy in front of the
well, it's a wolf disguised as a human!!

313086.「おまえさん……人間に 化けて\n あたしらを だましてたのかい！？:
You... you tricked us by turning yourself into
a human, didn't you?!

313087.「ちがうの……！\n タロは ただ 仲間になりたかっただけで\n 村を襲ったオオ:
You're wrong!! Taro came here to befriend us!
The wolf that attacked the village was Monto!

313088.「言いがかりは やめろ！\n そいつと つるんでた おまえも\n グルなんだろ！:
Enough lying! You've been hanging around with
him so you're in on the whole thing, aren't
you?!

313089.「くそっ……俺は 最初から\n あやしいと 思ってたんだ！\n みんな！ こいつ:
Damn it... I knew somethin' wasn't right!
Come on, let's clobber 'im!

313092.「なんだ……おまえは ウサギちゃんだったのか。\n ああ なんて……:
Well, well... so you're a rabbit, huh?
Ah, how...

313094.「月見団子を食って 人間の姿を手に入れたのに\n まさか 同じオオカミに 正体を:
You ate Moon Dumplings and became a human...
Never thought I'd be exposed by you, of all
people...

313100.「やった……やったよ！\n <cs_pchero>！！:
Yes, you did it!! Way to go,
<cs_pchero>!!

313102.伝説の銃 ススキラーは\n役目を 果たしたかのように\n消えてしまった……。:
The legendary gun Silverkiller disappeared,
as its role is now finished...

313103.<cs_pchero>は 元の職業に 戻った！: You returned to your original vocation!

313105.「……コリス？\n よかった……無事だったんだね。: Coris...? I'm relieved that you're safe.

313108.「人喰いオオカミを 退治してくださって\n ありがとうございます。:
We can't thank you enough for getting rid of
that wicked wolf.

313109.「タロよ……。皆から 話は聞いた。\n まさか この村に 人間に化けた\n オオ:
Taro... I heard from the others. I had no idea
that a wolf was hiding inside the village
by disguising as a human...

313110.「そなたが 突き止めてくれなかったら\n さらなる 犠牲者が 出ていたことじゃろ:
If you hadn't found the true culprit, there
would have been many more casualties. On
behalf of this village, I truly thank you.

313111.「タロ……疑って すまなかったね。\n 許しておくれ。:
Oh, Taro... I'm sorry that I doubted you.
Please forgive me...

313112.「ううん……。オイラも 人間の姿に\n 化けていたのは 本当だから……。:
It's all right... It is true that I was also
disguised as a human.

313113.「オオカミだったのは ビックリしたけど\n タロが この村を 救ってくれたことに:
The fact that you were a wolf did surprise me,
but I am grateful that you saved our village.

313114.「おうよ。\n これからは 好きなだけ この村にいてくれ。:
O' course. From now on, ya can stay in this
village as long as ya like.

313116.「ふたりも 一緒に この村で暮らそうよ。: Let's live together here in the village.

313117.「……ごめん タロ。私は もう 帰らなきゃ。\n 月が 呼んでる……。:
I'm sorry, Taro... I have to go home now.
The moon is calling to me...

313119.「私……じつは 月から やって来たの。\n 毎晩 アストルティアから 寂しそうに:
Actually, I... I come from the moon. Every
night I hear a lonely voice calling from
Astoltia... and I go to find this person.

313120.「そしたら ある村で\n 『満月の夜の物語』っていう 童話を見つけて\n 気がつ:
Then I found a fairytale called "A Tale of a
Full Moon Night" inside of a village, and then
somehow ended up here.

313121.「今 やっと わかったよ。\n あれは 月に向かって 遠吠えをしていた\n あな:
I finally understand now. What I heard was
your voice howling at the moon.

313122.「でも……もう あなたは ひとりじゃない。\n これからは 寂しくないから 大丈:
But, you're not alone anymore. Everything will
be just fine.

313123.「うん……。コリスが いないと\n オイラ 寂しいけど……もう 寂しくない。\n:
Yeah... I'm gonna miss you, Coris...
But I won't be lonely anymore. Will I see you
again?

313124.「うん……！\n どんなに 離れていても 私たちは\n すっと 友達だよ。:
Of course! No matter how far apart we are,
we'll always be friends.

313125.「<pc> 今まで ありがとう。\n お礼に これを 受け取って。:
Thank you for everything, <pc>.
Here, I want you to have this.

313127.「なんということじゃ……！\n あの方は 月の守り神様だったのじゃな……！！:
I don't believe it... that girl was the
guardian of the moon!!

313128.「さあ 皆の者！ 月見祭りを 始めようぞ！\n お月様に 感謝を込めて\n 月見:
Okay, everyone! Let the Moon Festival begin!
Let's offer our Moon Dumplings to show our
gratitude to the moon!

313129.「みんな とっても 楽しそうだね。\n コリスも月から この光景を見て\n 楽し:
Seems like everyone's having a lot of fun.
I hope Coris is enjoying watching us from up
there...

313130.「……あのさ。<pc>も\n この世界の人じゃ ないんでしょ？\n 不思議な に:
By the way... you aren't from this world
either, are you? You have a strange smell...

313131.「この村で 一緒に暮らせないのは 残念だけど\n また 遊びにきてね。:
It's a shame that we can't live here together,
but please come back to visit sometime.

313132.「……あれ？\n あの吟遊詩人さん 誰だろう……？\n 旅の人かな？:
Huh? Who's that bard over there? Is he a
traveler...?

313133.「<pc>のこと 呼んでるみたい……。\n 行ってあげたら？:
I think he's calling for you...
Why not go see what he wants?
